sentence.Network_en: Hong Ying is a controversial authoress lived in England.
sentence.Network_cn: 虹影是近年来文坛内外备受争议的一位旅英华文作家.

sentence.Network_en: The authoress has edited out all references to her own family.
sentence.Network_cn: 女作家将所有涉及其家族的内容全删掉.

sentence.Network_en: What this thesis studies is a remarkable authoress of British Victoria era.
sentence.Network_cn: 本篇论文所要研究的是英国维多利亚时代一名杰出的女作家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... poetess 女诗人 authoress 女作家 mayoress 女市长，市长夫人.

list.abs: in Marriage , a voluminous Tanci , was written by a Hangzhou authoress named Chen Duansheng in the Qianlong Period .长篇弹词《再生缘》是乾隆时杭州女作家陈端生的未完之作。
the Gadfly was written by Irish authoress Ethel Lilian Voynich and published in England in 1897 .《牛虻》一书由爱尔兰女作家艾捷尔?丽莲?伏尼契写成并于1897年在英国出版。
Lingshuhua ( 1900-1990 ) , a " New Boudoir Style " writer of the first generation authoress in the history of China " s Contemporary Literature .凌叔华（1900—1990)是中国现代文学史上第一代女作家群体中的“新闺秀派”作家。
the authoress , passing vinegary judgments on current literature , said that one famous author was obscene , another sloppy , a third superficial .这位女作家对当代文学作了一番刻薄的评论，说某一位著名作家淫秽，另一位懒散，第三位又肤浅。
He bowed to the authoress ., 他向这位女作家点点头.

entry.tran: 女作家（很多女作家反对这样的称呼，更喜欢被称为 author)
entry.def: An authoress is a female author. Many female writers object to this word, and prefer to be called authors.

auth_sentence.content: It is, then, all the more surprising that the great authoress appears to have opted out of the publicity machine.

auth_sentence.content: The pair attempt to elope, but fail, and the broken affair duly inspires our authoress to write.
